TITLE: Darwin Streaming Server Setup
MSG_0:
This document is Darwin Streaming Server setup for Live-Reporter.

Enter to “General Settings” for “Broadcast Username/Password”.
MSG_1:
Input your arbitrary “New User Name” and “New Password”.
On Live-Reporter, these input values will be requested
for broadcast authentication.
MSG_2: Input Darwin Streaming Server information on Live-Reporter App.
MSG_3:
In this sample, title field are input as “test.sdp”.

“test.sdp” is streaming name.

The streaming name is able to your arbitrary definition.
MSG_4:
Tap to “Connect” button.
And then input Darwin Streaming Server authentication on
Live-Reporter App.
MSG_5:
These user ID and password are “Broadcast Username/Password” on

Darwin Streaming Server.
MSG_6: Check “/usr/local/movies” of the file system on the server.
MSG_7: Your arbitrary streaming name file may exist as “test.sdp”.
